name: hlint
summary: Compiler definition for the hlint (haskell checker) tool
description:
hlint is an haskell code source checker, producing many warnings/recommendations. This script allow to vim to parse it's output and then jumping directly to pointed locations.

To use it :
:comp hlint
install_details:
Open the file in vim then type :
:so %

versions.release_notes:
Fixed problem with shellpipe
Switched to vimball distribution
